%Updated by Jaime Pitarch "pure water" absorption (a) and scattering (b) coefficients. 
%Absorption was taken from the "WOPP" data by Roettgers, where data from different sources were homogeneized to T=20 C and S=0 PSU. Posteriorly, data were shifted to S=35 PSU by using a da/dS coefficient of Roettgers et al. (2014) made for artificial seawater, except that such coefficient was set to zero below 510 nm as recommended. Source data are documented in the ATBD of WOPP, v. 2016. Below 300 nm, Mason and Fry's data was taken directly, as da/dT=da/dS=0
%Scattering was generated with the formulas of Zhang et al. (2009,2021), for T=20 C S=35 PSU.
%Header, row 4
%Header, row 5
%Header, row 6
%Header, row 7
